title: Fruitcake Chakram
info: The Fruitcake Chakram is a boomerang-type weapon dropped from Presents obtained during the Christmas seasonal event, with a chance of 0.626% in pre-Hardmode and 0.584% in Hardmode. Unlike the Thorn Chakram, it will not bounce off of blocks.
